briefTitle: A Study of LY2951742 (Galcanezumab) in Participants With Cluster Headache
officialTitle: A Phase 3b Multicenter, Single-Arm, Open-Label Safety Study of LY2951742 (Galcanezumab) in Patients With Episodic or Chronic Cluster Headache
summary: The main purpose of this study is to assess the long-term safety and tolerability of galcanezumab administered up to once monthly in participants with episodic or chronic cluster headache who have completed study I5Q-MC-CGAL (NCT02397473) or study I5Q-MC-CGAM (NCT02438826).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) and Serious AEs (SAEs)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline through End of Study (Up to 4 Years)
